div.div: Welcome to Rothsay Public School, home of the Tigers! Rothsay, an agricultural community is nestled right along I-94. A gateway to the lakes community, Rothsay is just a quick drive to several recreational and fishing lakes, state parks, and a variety of neighboring communities which offer great shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. Rothsay's rich history of supporting educational opportunities for its youth became even more evident when a new school was constructed in 2014-15. This ...

div.h1: Success is Measured In Many Ways!

div.div: Rothsay Public School is the heart of the community and we are proud to prepare our students to enter the world ready for the next level. Whether it be college bound, entering the workforce, or preparing for the military, we strive to help our students plan for their future. Preparing students academically is why we are here every day, along with creating a safe environment to grow and challenge students to be the BEST they can be!

"Maximum effort is the minimum requirement!"
At Rothsay School, every student is provided every opportunity to succeed. Teachers, coaches, parents, and community come together to support the students and school. Students are known and nutured through sports, academics, and fine arts as they learn and grow into their full potential.

div.span: Mission: To educate our students to become responsible citizens and lifelong learners.

div.h1: Opportunities for ALL Students at Rothsay School

p.span: Rothsay Elementary is home to students in pre-Kindergarten through sixth grade. Set in rural Minnesota, Rothsay School is a state-of-the art facility built in 2014-15. Students and families from many neighboring communities choose Rothsay as their school home because of the nurturing, personal, small class-size learning environment. Teachers at Rothsay Elementary are dedicated to creating learning space that caters to students individual needs and focuses on the growth of each and every child.

In addition to the educational offerings for pre-school and elementary-aged children, Rothsay School boasts a licensed child care. Infants, toddlers, and pre-school aged children are provided high quality child care year-round in the Rothsay School building. Rothsay Child Care staff are highly qualified, distinguished in child development training, and utilize top-rated curriculum to ensure the finest care and education for the youngest Rothsay Tigers.
